message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, especially considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget considerations.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? This would still be a significant saving compared to its actual value to you.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but I think that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to be within my budget.
